def_cn: 迅速打开(或关掉)(装置);按(开关)
def_en: If you flip a device on or off, or if you flip a switch, you turn it on or off by pressing the switch quickly.
If you flip through the pages of a book, for example, you quickly turn over the pages in order to find a particular one or to get an idea of the contents.
If something flips over, or if you flip it over or into a different position, it moves or is moved into a different position.
If you flip something, especially a coin, you use your thumb to make it turn over and over, as it goes through the air.

def_cn: 突然心烦意乱;勃然大怒
def_en: If someone flips, they suddenly become extremely upset or angry because of something that has happened.

def_cn: 轻率的;随便的;不严肃的
def_en: If you say that someone is being flip, you disapprove of them because you think that what they are saying shows they are not being serious enough about something.
